sentence.Network_en: a belief in the primacy of the family
Even in the 18th century scholars continued to give primacy to the written word.
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至到了18世纪，学者们仍然将书面语放在第一位。

sentence.Network_en: The political idea at the heart of this is the primacy of the individual.
sentence.Network_cn: 其核心的政治观点就是把个人放在首位。

primacy of subjectivity 主体性优位primacy zone 初位区primal 原始的
regional planning 区域规划regional primacy 地区性首市现象regional shopping centre 区域购物中心
的初始效应 (primacy effect),最初看见的配对影响他们对共变量的判断胜于整体经验到的共变程度.相反的,中国人的判断完全没有呈现 …
首因效应 (Primacy effect): 相比中间时长的记忆人们更易回忆起最近的与最早的记忆。从众效应 (Bandwagon effect) : 多数人的意见往.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French primatie, from medieval Latin primatia, from Latin primas, primat- 'of the first rank' (see primate)

entry.def: The primacy of something is the fact that it is the most important or most powerful thing in a particular situation.

example.ex: The political idea at the heart of this is the primacy of the individual.
example.tran: 其核心的政治观点就是把个人放在首位。
经验相对于分析的重要性

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being first in importance
